channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's pick for intel chief, Tulsi Gabbard, faces her confirmation hearing
item.description: Among the topics likely to come up at the hearing: her 2017 meeting with Syrian President Bashar al-Assad, her friendly positions toward Russia and he...

item.title: Zuma's daughter arrested over South Africa riots
item.description: Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla is accused of inciting violence in 2021 following the jailing of her father.

item.title: Man who burned Quran 'shot dead in Sweden'
item.description: Salwan Momika, 38, is reported to have been killed in an apartment in Södertälje, Stockholm.

item.title: Here are some of the deadliest plane crashes in US history

item.description: The exchange is part of a deal between Israel and Hamas that will see a total of 33 hostages returned to Israel in exchange for around 1,900 Palestini...

item.title: What to know about the collision between a passenger jet and Army helicopter near DC
Deadly plane crash in D.C.'s Potomac River after midair collision with helicopter
item.description: Search efforts continue after a plane from Wichita, with 64 people on board, collided with an Army helicopter near Washington, D.C., and crashed into ...

item.title: What we know so far about the midair collision over the Potomac River
item.description: A regional jet carrying 64 people collided with an Army Black Hawk helicopter. Reagan National Airport grounded all flights.

item.title: Jesse Eisenberg isn't ambitious — but he does worry about failing
item.description: Actor, writer and director Jesse Eisenberg says he has had more failures than successes. In this week's Wild Card , he opens up about ambition and his...

item.title: 3 Israeli hostages released in Gaza in third exchange with Hamas
item.description: Two female Israeli soldiers and an 80-year-old male hostage were released in chaotic handovers in Gaza that have been condemned by Israel's leader.

item.title: What we know so far about Washington DC plane crash
item.description: The aircraft collided with a military helicopter that was on a training flight as it approached the runway.

item.description: An American Airlines jet carrying 60 passengers and four crew members has collided with an Army helicopter while landing at Ronald Reagan National Air...

item.title: What we know about the midair collision outside D.C.
item.description: A passenger jet carrying more than 60 people collided with an Army Black Hawk helicopter carrying three soldiers near Reagan National Airport Wednesda...

item.title: Case solved decades after woman tried for 3 murders vanished from prison
item.description: Sharon Kinne was charged with killing her Missouri husband, her boyfriend's wife and a man she'd picked up in a Mexican bar.

item.title: DR Congo president vows 'vigorous' fight to halt M23 rebel advance
item.description: DR Congo's leader says the country "will not let itself be humiliated" after rebels seized the city of Goma.

item.title: After fires, LA students yearn to get back to school, and a normal life
item.description: The historic fires in Los Angeles meant many students lost homes, schools, or both. Now, as some schools reopen, families are trying to find routine.

item.title: Trans community fears Trump's actions will upend legal precedent on prison protections

item.title: Five skiers killed in French Alps avalanches
item.description: Two separate avalanches killed four Norwegians and one Swiss skier.
